# Chris Misztur

> Chris Misztur is the President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, specializing in building Smart Factories, both real and virtual. With over two decades of experience, he integrates business systems into manufacturing processes, focusing on continuous learning and innovative technology application for digital transformation.

Chris Misztur brings over 20 years of experience in industrial digital transformation from the Greater Chicago Area. As President & Founder of Mr. IIoT, he leads initiatives to build Smart Factories, leveraging his proprietary "5C" closed-loop feedback approach and the SHARC IoT adapter to revolutionize industrial processes. He is committed to empowering businesses to thrive in today's technology-driven environment.

## Pages
[Home](https://chrismisztur.com/): Home page with hero, services overview, testimonials.
[About](https://chrismisztur.com/about.html): About page with bio, timeline, values.
[Services](https://chrismisztur.com/services.html): Detailed services offered.
[Solutions](https://chrismisztur.com/solutions.html): Industries and solutions served.
[Process](https://chrismisztur.com/process.html): How they work / methodology.
[Contact](https://chrismisztur.com/contact.html): Contact information and booking.
[Free IIoT Assessment](https://chrismisztur.com/audit.html): Free consultation / discovery call.
